data.title: List of all female Univision reporters to watch in 2022
data.meta_description: The FEMALE UNIVISION REPORTERS are exceptional at news reporting and presentation. Get to learn more about their career, education, and so much more here.
data.text:
Univision is one of the most-watched channels for Spanish language content. Viewers from across the United States tune in to the station to have a glimpse of what is happening around the world. Part of its success comes from its female Univision reporters, who are exceptional at news reporting and presentation.

Univision is a diversified Spanish-language media company with interests in television, radio and the internet. The company was founded in the early 1960s, and it has risen through the ranks to become the most-watched Spanish-language television network in the United States. The company headquarters are in Miami.

List of all female Univision reporters

If you love watching the news, then you will agree that it has a lot to do with the presentation too. This is something that the Univision newscast has mastered. Here is a list of the female Univision reporters you need to watch in 2022.

1. Ilia Calderon

Full names: Ilia Calderon Chamat

Date of birth: May 15, 1972

Age: 50 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Choco, Colombia

Profession: Journalist

Ilia is one of the most famous female news anchors on Univision. She is currently serving as the news anchor for the national evening newscast show on the channel alongside Jorge Ramos. Before this role, she worked at Telemundo, where she served as the host of the Noticiero Telemundo weekend edition.

She is the first Afro-Latina to anchor a weekday primetime newscast for a major broadcast station in the US. Ilia is a holder of a social work degree from Universidad de Antioquia.

2. Patricia Janiot

Full names: Angela Patricia Janiot Martirena

Date of birth: October 2, 1963

Age: 59 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Santander, Colombia

Profession: Journalist and news anchor

Patricia is a famous Colombian journalist and news anchor. She is currently serving as the news anchor and senior correspondent for Univision. Before this role, she was the senior news anchor for CNN en Espanol, a position she held for 25 years.

She is also a former model. Patricia participated in various pageants, including Miss Colombia (1983) and Miss World (1984). She is an alumnus of Universidad de la Sabana in Bogota, where she graduated with a degree in journalism.

3. Maity Interiano

Full names: Maria Teresa Interiano Medina

Date of birth: January 15, 1985

Age: 37 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Gainesville, Florida

Profession: Journalist, anchor, and television producer

Maity is one of the lead reporters and correspondents at Univision. She is currently serving as the co-anchor of Noticiero Univision Fin de Semanas alongside Felix de Bedout. Maity is also part of the Despierta America morning show.

Before joining Univision, she worked as a producer and reporter for Escandalo TV. She graduated from Elon University in 2006. As a journalist, she has covered a wide range of stories, including the Royal Wedding of Prince William and the 2014 FIFA World Cup in Brazil.

4. Pamela Silva Conde

Full names: Pamela Silva Conde

Date of birth: August 16, 1981

Age: 41 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Lima, Peru

Profession: Journalist and anchor

Pamela is a journalist currently serving as the co-anchor of Primer Impacto, a weekday news magazine show on Univision. She joined the show in 2011, and she has covered a wide range of stories, including the terrorist attack at the Boston Marathon.

Before joining Univision, she worked for several other media houses, including WLTV and TeleFutura. Silva graduated with a degree in broadcast journalism from Florida International University. She also holds a Master's degree in business administration from the same institution.

5. Teresa Rodriguez

Full names: Teresa Rodriguez

Date of birth: February 26, 1962

Place of birth: Metro Miami, Florida

Age: 60 years old as of 2022

Profession: Anchor, journalist

Teresa is one of the most popular female Spanish news anchors. She is renowned for her current role as the co-anchor of Aqui y Ahora, a primetime award-winning news magazine program airing on Univision.

In addition, she hosts the weekly segments titled Primer Plano and America through Spanish Eyes. Before joining Univision, she served as the anchor of WTVJ-Channel 4. She holds a bachelor's degree in economics and marketing from Barry University.

6. Jackie Guerrido

Full names: Jackie Guerrido

Date of birth: September 27, 1972

Age: 50 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: San Juan, Puerto Rico

Profession: Weather forecaster and journalist

Jackie is one of the Univision news reporters. She is currently serving as the co-anchor of Primer Impacto alongside Pamela Silva Conde. For several years, she worked as the weather presenter for Despierta America. She studied journalism at the University of Florida. The weather forecaster has also participated in the Spanish-speaking version of Dancing with the Stars.

7. Nayeli Chavez-Geller

Full names: Nayeli Chavez-Geller

Place of birth: Oaxaca, Mexico

Profession: Correspondent, journalist

Nayeli serves as the correspondent for Primer Impacto, a daily news magazine show on Univision. She has served in this position for more than 10 years. Before joining the show, she served as the producer for Al Rojo Vivo and Aqui y Ahora. She has covered several stories such as the Baltimore Riots, Hurricane Sandy, Pope Visit in 2015, and others.

8. Ana Maria Canseco

Full names: Rocio Ana Maria Canseco

Date of birth: September 5, 1967

Age: 55 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Mexico City, Mexico

Profession: Television host

Ana serves as the co-host of the morning talk show Despierta America on Univision. She was one of the original co-hosts of the show when she joined it in 1997. However, she left the show in 2010 after serving for 13 years. She made a comeback in 2020, and she is still hosting the show. Ana has also been part of the cast of the Un Nuevo Dia morning show on Telemundo.

9. Karla Martinez

Full names: Karla Martinez

Date of birth: May 11, 1976

Age: 46 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Ciudad Juarez, Mexico

Profession: Television hostess

Karla is a famous TV show hostess. She is currently serving as the co-host of the Despierta America morning show on Univision. Before joining the show, she served as the host of the Control show from 2006 to 2009. She holds a degree in electronic media from the University of Texas at El-Paso.

10. Satcha Pretto

Full names: Satcha Pretto

Date of birth: April 5, 1980

Age: 42 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: La Paz, Honduras

Profession: Journalist, news anchor

Satcha is a Honduran journalist renowned for her role as the news anchor of the Despierta America morning show. She joined the show in 2011. Before this role, she served as the co-host of Primer Impacto.

She has worked for several other media companies, including KTLE-Telemundo, KWES-TV, and KUVN Channel 23. Satcha graduated with a Bachelor of Arts degree in Communications from Angelo State University in Texas.

11. Lili Estefan

Full names: Liliana Del Carmen Estefan

Date of birth: March 20, 1967

Age: 55 years old as of 2022

Place of birth: Santiago de Cuba, Cuba

Profession: Model, television presenter

Estefan is renowned for her position as the co-host of El Gordo y la Flaca on Univision. She has been honoured with the Lifetime Achievement Award thanks to her outstanding performance as the show's host. Besides hosting the show, she is recognized for her work as one of the panel judges on Mira Quien Baila.

There you have it. A comprehensive list of all female Univision reporters to watch in 2022. These female reporters have been at the forefront of reporting the news, and they have done a pretty good job in dissecting the current events and putting them into perspective for you to understand. Most of them have voices and faces that share the most notable events worldwide.

Tuko.co.ke published an article about the female MSNBC news anchors. MSNBC is one of the most renowned channels when it comes to news. Part of its success comes from its renowned female journalists who are exceptional at news presentation. For many years, Americans have trusted MSNBC anchors as sources for world news and events.

While some of the best female MSNBC news anchors have been at the forefront of reporting the news, they have also dissected current events and put them into perspective for all to understand. Some of the names featured on this list include Andrea Mitchell, Chris Jansing, Hallie Jackson, Joy Reid, Kasie Hunt, Katy Tur, and others.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
